author: oheger
msg: Added new event type constants for basic update events.
A new test class was added to check whether the types are correctly set up.

author: oheger
msg: Reworked ConfigurationEvent to conform to the new event mechanism.
The class now extends Event and can handle an EventType. The old numeric type
is still stored; it will be removed when the refactoring is complete.

author: oheger
msg: The interface is now replaced by the generic EventListener interface.

author: oheger
msg: Removed deprecated event handling methods from ReloadingController.
All callers of these methods have been adapted; so they are now obsolete and

author: oheger
msg: Adapted ReloadingBuilderSupportListener to changes on ReloadingController.
The new event mechanism is used to register the listener.
